name: flt
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: flt
  version: "2025.2"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/flt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e57507126cb3f422d1eb6516df0621b900dde6da6765d413d0941e38d4a1aac8

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools >=74.1
    - setuptools-scm >=8
    - cython
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - numpy

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - flt
        - flt.generic
  - requirements:
      run:
        - python
        - pip
    script:
      - pip check

about:
  summary: fast Legendre transform
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/ntessore/flt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ntessore
    - paddyroddy
    - Saransh-cpp
